name: Ac1dra1n
body: # Ac1dRa1n Custom-length custom-model random password generator. Generates tough and purely randomized passwords. # Getting Ruby OS X Users : ``` $ brew install ruby ``` Debian/GNU/Linux : ``` $ sudo apt-get install ruby-full ``` # Running Ac1dRa1n Run this command from the HackSaw directory : ``` $ ruby script.rb ``` Note : Ensure all require_relative files are in the same directory as script.rb
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
